document.title: [PS3] Mise a jour PSN du 10/11/2010
document.author: JohnCouscous
document.text:
Hello, voici la mise à jour de la semaine (10/11/2010) sur le PlayStation Network :
PlayStation Store (via PS3, PSP et Media Go) Offres spéciales disponibles jusqu’au 24 novembre TMNT: Turtle in Time Re-Shelled (prix initial : 9.99€ – maintenant : 6.99€) Cell Factor: Psychokinetic Wars (prix initial : 9.99€ – maintenant : 6.99€) Assassin’s Creed II: Sequence 12 : Battle of Forli (prix initial : 3.99€ – maintenant : 2.49€) Assassin’s Creed II: Sequence 13 : Bonfire of the Vanities (prix initial : 3.99€ – maintenant : 2.49€) Assassin’s Creed II: Sequence 13 : Bonfire of the Vanities & Secret Locations (prix initial : 6.99€ – maintenant : 3.99€) Assassin’s Creed: Bloodlines (PSP) (prix initial : 29.99€ – maintenant : 19.99€) Tom Clancy’s EndWar (PSP) (prix initial : 19.99€ – maintenant : 9.99€) ChessMaster: The Art of Learning (PSP) (prix initial : 19.99€ – maintenant : 9.99€) Mystery of the Crystal Portal (mini) (prix initial : 4.99€ – maintenant : 2.99€) Réduction permanente du prix Harvest Moon: Hero of Leaf Valley : – maintenant 24.99€ Jeux téléchargeables (PS3) Crescent Pale Mist (4.99€) – PEGI 12 Söldner-X 2: Final Prototype & The Last Chapter Bundle (14.99€) – PEGI 7 Jeux téléchargeables (PSP) WWE Smackdown vs. Raw 2011 (39.99€) – PEGI 16 NBA 2K11 (29.99€) – PEGI 3 Jeux PSone (PS3 et PSP) Grandia (7.99€) – PEGI 12 minis (PS3 et PSP) 3, 2, 1… Supercrash! (2.99€) – PEGI 3 Jewel Keepers: Easter Island (4.99€) – PEGI 3 Application (PS3) MUBI (gratuit) – PEGI 18 Ajouts de jeux et contenus (PS3) EyePet – PEGI 3 – Dinosaur Styling Pack (2.99€) – Hoodie Styling Pack (2.99€) Front Mission: Evolved – Weapons Pack 02 (2.99€) – PEGI 16 God of War III : Morpheus Character Skin (0.99€) – PEGI 18 Hustle Kings – Carom and UK Billiards Pack (1.99€) – PEGI 3 Just Cause 2 : Chaos Parachute (gratuit) – PEGI 18 ModNation Racers – PEGI 7 – Ratchet & Clank Pack (1.75€) – Stunt Pack (gratuit) My Aquarium : Big Fish Set (0.99€)- PEGI 3 PAIN : Maxine Pack (0.99€)- PEGI 16 Guitar Hero: Warriors of Rock – PEGI 12 – ‘Red Barchetta’ By Rush (1.99€) – ‘Tom Sawyer’ By Rush (1.99€) – Guitar Hero: Warriors of Rock 1 Track Pack (17.99€) Rock Band 3 – PEGI 12 – Bon Jovi Greatest Hits: Rock Band Edition (14.99€) – Contient les titres énumérés ci-dessous : – ‘Bad Medicine’ (1.49€) – ‘Blaze Of Glory’ (1.49€) – ‘Have A Nice Day’ (1.49€) – ‘I’ll Be There For You’ (1.49€) – ‘It’s My Life’ (1.49€) – ‘Lay Your Hands On Me’ (1.49€) – ‘Livin’ On A Prayer (RB3 Version)’ (1.49€) – ‘Runaway’ (1.49€) – ‘Wanted Dead Or Alive (RB3 Version)’ (1.49€) – ‘We Weren’t Born To Follow’ (1.49€) – ‘Who Says You Can’T Go Home’ (1.49€) – ‘You Give Love A Bad Name (RB3 Version)’ (1.49€) – ‘Blue Monday’ by New Order (1.49€) – ‘Burning Down The House’by Talking Heads (1.49€) Rock Band Network – PEGI 12 – ‘A Drug Against War’ by KMFDM (1.49€) – ‘Blood Red Rock’ by Bang Camaro (0.79€) – ‘Dethroned’ by Death Angel (1.49€) – ‘Scavengers Of The Damned’ by Aiden (1.49€) – ‘You Ain’t No Family’ by iwrestledabearonce (1.49€) Avatars (PS3) Söldner-X 2: Final Prototype Avatar Bundle 2 (1.49€) Söldner-X 2: Final Prototype Avatar Bundle 3 (1.49€) EyePet – Astronaut Pet (0.25€) – Paw Icon (0.25€) – Pet Run Happy (0.25€) Thèmes (PSP) No Heroes Allowed Theme Thèmes Premium (PS3) Disruptive Themes – Atlas (1.49€) – Whimsical Fantasy (1.49€) Vidéos (PS3) DC Universe Online E3 Trailer DC Universe Online Gamescom Trailer MUBI Trailer Invizimals Trailer Vidéos (PSP) No Heroes Allowed Launch Trailer Cette semaine je vous conseille vivement TMNT, qui reste une ancienne référence de la Super Nintendo remasterisée en matière de beat’em all et jouable à 4 online et en coop, un must have. Pour le reste, je ne vois pas de nouveautés intéressantes pour moi.
